name: The Source (Little Glyph Games)
description:
The Source is a fantasy real time strategy game where you must help your clan find a mysterious and powerful artefact known only as The Source. Upgrade your clan, defend yourself from the other clans and gain new territory. But don't forget to be searching for The Source, because the other 3 clans want it as desperately as you do!

Our story takes place in the land of Middle Vale, [REDACTED], [REDACTED], and [REDACTED].  ᴬʰᵉᵐ.

Takes place in Middle Vale A land of magic, adventure, danger, and mystery. Long ago, this land was created with The Source, a powerful relic. The Source was once shared by the people.

But One day, the people broke apart into 4 clans:

-THE CLAN OF THE SCRIBES

-THE CLAN OF THE BUILDERS

-THE CLAN OF THE ALCHEMISTS

-THE CLAN OF THE ADVENTURERS]

In their wars, the source was lost deep in the earth. But it may not be lost forever. The clans have remembered the power of The Source, and now each clan is racing to find it before the others, so they may show the world to their liking.

MAJOR SPOILERS for the game. I recommend you do not look until you've opened the first safe.
